item.title: Over $1B in U.S. Treasury Notes Has Been Tokenized on Public Blockchains
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: Tokenized Treasuries are digital representations of U.S. government bonds that can be traded as digital tokens on the blockchain.

item.title: Recapping FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried's Trial
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried was convicted last year. Here's how his trial came together.

item.title: Bitcoin Halving Could Bolster ETF Tailwinds for the Cryptocurrency: Canaccord
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: If history repeats itself, an even more bullish period for bitcoin and crypto markets could be on the horizon in the months following the halving, the report said.

item.title: Fewer Than 30% of Jurisdictions Globally Have Started Regulating Crypto: FATF Chief
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: Globally, less than 30% of jurisdictions have started regulating the crypto sector as of June 2023, the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) President T. Raja Kumar told CoinDesk in an interview from Singapore.
item.media:keywords: VASPS, FATF, T. Raja Kumar, Financial Action Task Force, Anti-Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing, Crypto

media:content.media:description: FATF President T. Raja Kumar addressing a press conference in Paris, France, in October 2022. (Amitoj Singh/CoinDesk)

item.title: Indonesia Will Require Crypto Products to Pass Through Regulatory Sandbox or Be Deemed Illegal
item.dc:creator: Shenna Peter
item.description: The initiative is aimed at combating fraud and will kick in at the start of next year.

item.title: Canadian Province Asks QuadrigaCX Co-Founder to Explain His Wealth in New Order
item.dc:creator: Sam Reynolds
item.description: This is the third test for the Province's new tool to combat money laundering.

item.title: Bitcoin Cash Rallies 13% Ahead of BCH Halving, Bitcoin Steady Around $70K
item.dc:creator: Shaurya Malwa
item.description: The Bitcoin Cash halving is expected on Apr.4, blockchain trackers show, and has historically preceded price bumps.

item.title: Bitcoin, Ether Could Witness Upside Volatility as $15B Options Expiry Looms
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: Dealer hedging could breed volatility at around $70,000, one observer said.

item.title: Crypto Addresses of 'Hamas-Aligned' Gaza Now Is Sanctioned by U.S, U.K.
item.dc:creator: Cheyenne Ligon
item.description: Blockchain analytics firm Elliptic found that the online organization raised a mere $21,000 in crypto for Hamas since the October 7th attacks.

item.title: Ethena, a $1.3B Yield-Earning Protocol, to Debut Governance Token Next Week
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The DeFi protocol, which generates yield from ether derivative funding rates, is set to airdrop 750 million ENA tokens, 5% of the total supply, on April 2.

item.title: BlackRock's Tokenized Fund Quickly Rakes in $245M, Right Behind Franklin Templeton's Older Offering
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The tokenized U.S. Treasury market is poised to reach $1 billion "very soon" given the growth of BlackRock's BUIDL, an analyst noted.

media:content.media:description: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink is now a leader in tokenization. (Will Ess for Pixelmind.ai/CoinDesk)

item.title: BlackRock's Fink Says an Ether ETF Is Possible Even if ETH Is a Security
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink isn't worried about the U.S. Securities and Exchange classifying Ethereum's ether as a security.
item.media:keywords: blackrock larry fink, blackrock spot bitcoin etf, blackrock ether etf, ethereum, eth, btc

item.title: What Binance's Exit From Nigeria Means for P2P Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Ray Youssef

item.title: The Protocol: Meme Coins (and Pepe's Best Friend) Swarm Coinbase Layer 2 Chain
item.dc:creator: Bradley Keoun
item.description: The meme coin frenzy that drove up activity – and failed transactions – on Solana appears to have quickly migrated to Base, Coinbase's six-month-old layer-2 blockchain. Who is the blue-faced creature behind the $BRETT token?

item.title: Crypto Stocks Like MicroStrategy, Coinbase Could Shoot Up if Short Sellers Exit
item.dc:creator: Aoyon Ashraf
item.description: MicroStrategy and Coinbase's stock prices could shoot up if short sellers bail out, according to a report by data analytics firm S3 Partners.

media:content.media:description: Heavily shorted crypto stocks like MicroStrategy could be poised to shoot up. (Mediamodifier/Pixabay)

item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The allocation marks to first example of a crypto protocol leveraging BlackRock's tokenized fund for its own offering.

item.title: The Munchables Hack Is Way Worse Than It Seems
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kuhn
item.description: Apparently orchestrated from North Korea, the $63 million hack adds grist to the argument that crypto exploits pose a plausible national security risk.

item.description: MyShell uses blockchains to let creators earn a profit for building AI apps and Her-like companions.

item.title: Ether.Fi's ETHFI Jumps 50% to Record, May Boost Valuations for Liquid Restaking Token Airdrops: Analyst

item.description: The performance of EtherFi's token could lift valuations of other restaking platforms ahead of their airdrops, one analyst noted.

item.title: U.S Has its 11th Spot Bitcoin ETF After Hashdex Fund Conversion
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: Trading under the ticker DEFI, asset manager Hashdex’s Bitcoin Futures ETF – which had been trading as a futures-based fund on the New York Stock Exchange since 2022 – was renamed and converted into the Hashdex Bitcoin ETF and now operates as a spot bitcoin fund.
item.media:keywords: Hashdex bitcoin ETF, spot bitcoin ETFs, bitcoin

media:content.media:description: The Hashdex Bitcoin ETF becomes the 11th spot bitcoin fund trading in the U.S. (viarami/Pixabay)

item.title: The Benefits of Assets Tokenization
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dean
item.description: We need to start thinking of blockchains as infrastructure for financial innovation rather than concentrating on the prices of a few digital assets, like bitcoin and ether, says WisdomTree’s digital of digital assets, Benjamin Dean.

item.title: UK Ad Rules Apply to Influencers, Crypto Memes, Regulator Confirms in New Guidance
item.dc:creator: Camomile Shumba
item.description: "The use of memes in promotions is particularly prevalent in the crypto-asset sector," the FCA's guidance said.

item.title: BOB, a 'Hybrid' Layer-2 Blockchain Mixing Bitcoin and Ethereum, Raises $10M
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: The round was led by Castle Island Ventures and included participation from Mechanism Ventures, Bankless Ventures, CMS Ventures and UTXO Management.

item.title: The Enablers of Decentralized AI
item.dc:creator: Jesus Rodriguez
item.description: AI naturally evolves as an increasingly centralized technology, and any decentralization efforts are an uphill battle. But decentralization can win in specific areas of AI development, says Jesus Rodriguez, CEO of IntoTheBlock.

item.title: Coinbase Loses Most of Motion to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: A federal judge ruled the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) brought enough of a case arguing that Coinbase is operating an unregistered broker, exchange and clearinghouse that its suit against the crypto trading company should move forward.

media:content.media:description: Brian Armstrong speaks at a political rally hosted by Stand With Crypto. (Screenshot from Coinbase video)

item.title: KuCoin Withdrawals Spike to $1B in Crypto Amid U.S. Regulatory Clampdown
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The surge occurred as U.S. federal prosecutors charged the exchange and two of its founders with violating anti-money laundering laws on Tuesday.

item.title: Amid Giant Crypto Rally, Hopes for Another DeFi Summer Soar
item.dc:creator: Ian Allison
item.description: Since the approval of spot bitcoin ETFs in January, DeFi looks ascendant, triggering memories of 2020, aka DeFi Summer, when the space bustled with activity.

item.title: 21Shares Lists ETP for Staking Telegram-Endorsed Token TON
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: The 21Shares Toncoin Staking ETP (TONN) listed on Swiss SIX Exchange on Wednesday.

item.title: Crypto Chip Company Katena Wins Lawsuit Filed by Bitcoin Miner Coinmint
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: Crypto technology firm Katena Computing didn't trick miner Coinmint into a $150 million purchase agreement, a panel of arbitrators ruled last month in the mining company's suit against Katena and a semiconductor company called DX Corr.

item.title: Bitcoin Mining Was More Profitable in February Than January: Jefferies
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: Publicly traded North American mining companies produced a smaller share of new bitcoin last month, slipping to 17.5% of the total network, the report said.

item.title: Illicit Funds in Crypto Ecosystem Shrank 9% Last Year, Yet Criminals Still Handled Nearly $35B: TRM Labs
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: Illicit activity in the cryptocurrency ecosystem appears to have reduced, with the total illicit funds shrinking by 9% in 2023 compared to 2022, even though criminals still handled over $34 billion worth of cryptocurrencies, Blockchain analytics firm TRM Labs has found.
item.media:keywords: North Korea, TRM Labs, Illicit Scams, Tron, USDT, Tether, Crypto, Crypto Economy

item.title: Diamonds Arrive on a Blockchain With New Tokenized Fund on Avalanche Network
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The tokenization of real-world assets – or placing traditional assets onto blockchain rails – is a growing trend in crypto with global financial giants entering the space.
item.media:keywords: avalanche, avax, tokenization, tokenized assets, tokenized rwa

item.title: Three Decentralized Platforms to Merge AI Tokens, Create AI Alliance
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: The three firms are seeking to create an AI collective to provide a decentralized alternative to existing projects that are controlled by Big Tech.

item.title: Layer-1 Blockchain Peaq Raises $15M to Expand Its DePIN Ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: Crypto market data provider Messari estimates that decentralized physical infrastructure networks could have a market value of $3.5 trillion by 2028.

item.title: How Sam Bankman-Fried's Sentencing Hearing May Play Out
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried will find out this week if he is potentially facing decades in prison. Judge Lewis Kaplan is set to sentence him for his conviction last year on two fraud charges and five conspiracy charges tied to the operation and collapse of FTX.

item.title: OKX Quietly Settled Regulatory 'Failings' With Malta Financial Services Authority
item.dc:creator: Ian Allison
item.description: The $322,000 “goodwill” settlement with MFSA related to OKX’s Okcoin Europe subsidiary.

item.title: Hong Kong-Based Asset Manager VSFG and Value Partners Apply for Spot Bitcoin ETF
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: Asset Manager VSFG, together with its partners, Value Partners, have applied for a spot-bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) with Hong Kong's Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), its Head of Investment & Products Brian Chan told CoinDesk on Wednesday.
item.media:keywords: VSFG, Hong Kong, Hong Kong SFC, HKMA, Crypto, Spot-bitcoin ETF, Bitcoin ETF, Application, Value Partners
